pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dataset Shift with Outlier Scores // Test for no adverse shift in two-sample comparison when we have a training set, the reference distribution, and a test set. The approach is flexible (extensible) and relies on a robust and powerful test statistic, the weighted AUC. See Kamulete, V. M. (2021) arXiv:2107.02990 for details. Outlier scores such as trust scores and prediction uncertainty can be used as the basis for comparison for example.
